data.title: Who was The Young and the Restless actress Andrea Evans?
data.meta_description: DAYTIME soaps star, Andrea Evans, was widely known for her roles on The Young and the Restless and One Life to Live.Sadly, the Y&R actress passed
data.text:
DAYTIME soaps star, Andrea Evans, was widely known for her roles on The Young and the Restless and One Life to Live.

Sadly, the Y&R actress passed away on July 9, 2023, at 66 years old—she is survived by her husband and daughter.

Who was Andrea Evans?

Andrea Lynn Evans was an actress born on June 18, 1957, in Aurora, Illinois.

While Evans was studying at the University of Illinois, she landed her first acting gig as an extra for the 1978 film The Fury.

The following year, Evans landed her first major role as Tina Lord in the hit ABC soap opera, One Life to Live.

She appeared on and off the show until 2011 when she retired her character.

While Evans played the role of Tina, she also appeared on both The Young and the Restless and The Bold and the Beautiful as Tawny Moore.

In 2000, Andrea appeared as Rebecca Hotchkiss in the soap show, Passions for a hefty 627 episodes.

The show was canceled in July 2007 though episodes ran through August 2008.

Throughout Evan's personal life, she was married twice—once to her ex-husband, Wayne Massey, and second, to her longtime husband Steve Rodriguez.

Steve and Andrea had been married since 1998 and the two adopted a daughter named Kylie in 2004.

What was her cause of death?

On July 9, 2023, Andrea Evans passed away after battling cancer.

The news broke after her former manager, Don Carroll confirmed the late actress' passing.

Evan's current manager, Nick Leicht, told PEOPLE: "I've been working with Andrea for the past 7 years.

"She was such a tremendous talent and an absolute joy to work with."

Since the news broke out, fans and friends of Evans have been extending their condolences.

One user wrote on Twitter: "RIP to a real one. Andrea Evans managed to create 4 very different and Iconic characters in Daytime Dramas and it was always a good ride.

"I'm so sad we won't see that genius grace the genre again. Condolences to her family and friends and fellow fans of this great actress!"

What was her net worth?

According to Celebrity Net Worth, Andrea Evans had a net worth of $5million.

In 2015, Evans was nominated for a Daytime Emmy Award for Outstanding Performer in a New Approaches Drama Series for her performance in the web series, DeVanity.

The same year, she won an ISA Award for Best Guest Actress on the web series.
